definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: Along the roof line there are 10 pointed cupolas.
sentences.chinese: 沿着屋顶线条有10处突出的炮塔。

sentences.english: Gunners on Humvees have high casualty rates.
sentences.chinese: 悍马炮塔上的枪手伤亡率一直很高。

sentences.english: Gears whine as turrets traverse, zeroing in on the lead elements.
sentences.chinese: 齿轮哀炮塔作为导线，在零对铅元素。

sentences.english: Increase all damage from Siege Engine and its turrets.
sentences.chinese: 增加攻城车以及其炮塔的所有伤害。

sentences.english: It’s the retail version of the doomsday machine.
sentences.chinese: 这是零售界版本的死光炮塔。
一座激光炮塔瞄准了博加。

sentences.english: The gun on the turret could be swivelled once in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 炮塔的火炮可在一分钟内旋转一周。

sentences.english: The team also decided to go with a manned turret for maximum situational awareness.
sentences.chinese: 该小组还决定使用一个最大的态势感知载人炮塔。

sentences.english: No, the auto- turrets currently only attack ground.
sentences.chinese: 不能，自动炮塔目前只能攻击地面单位。

sentences.english: SALVO FIRE is the simultaneous firing of all guns ready and aimed at the same target.
sentences.chinese: 齐射同口径火炮炮塔备便并同时瞄准射击同一目标。

sentences.english: Tanks are well-armored vehicles with a revolving turret.
sentences.chinese: 坦克装置一个可旋转式炮塔并拥有良好的装甲。

sentences.english: Here is the navigator's place in the turret.
sentences.chinese: 炮塔系统中导航员位置。

sentences.english: It is now possible to remove ammo from anchored sentry guns and missile batteries.
sentences.chinese: 可以移除已锚定的岗哨炮和弹道炮塔上的弹药。

sentences.english: As Optimus, complete the rescue of Cliffjumper without using the turret.
sentences.chinese: 操作擎天柱，在不使用炮塔的情况下营救飞过山。

sentences.english: MIAG was to construct the chassis, while Daimler-Benz was construct the turret.
sentences.chinese: MIAG是建立在底盘，而戴姆勒奔驰是建造炮塔。

sentences.english: The ASCOD features a Lockheed-designed turret for the planned scout variant.
sentences.chinese: ASCOD具有由洛克希德设计的计划侦察变种炮塔。

definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
